TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqIntegrationBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase
Public NotInheritable Class MsmqIntegrationBindingElement Inherits MsmqBindingElementBase

summary.span: 這個繫結項目可用於讓 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 應用程式在現有的 MSMQ 應用程式中傳送和接收訊息，此 MSMQ 應用程式使用 COM、MSMQ 原生 API 或 中的 API。

span.span: This binding element can be used to enable Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) applications to send messages to and receive messages from existing MSMQ applications that use either COM, MSMQ native APIs, or the APIs in .

summary.span: 您可以使用這個類別來傳送及接收來自 MSMQ 訊息應用程式的訊息。

span.span: Use this class to send and receive messages from MSMQ-based messaging applications.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory<TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context);

span.span: An MSMQ integration channel factory that can be used to create channels to send messages to existing MSMQ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建置通道處理站，以便開發人員用來建立可與服務進行通訊的用戶端通道。This method builds a channel factory that enables the developer to create a client channel to communicate with a service. 通道處理站並不是通道，而是能夠建立通道的處理站。The channel factory is not a channel, but rather a factory that can create a channel. 您可以呼叫 `IChannelFactory.CreateChannel` 來建立通道。You create a channel by calling `IChannelFactory.CreateChannel`.

The is not .
is and is .

span.span: CustomDeadLetterQueue is not null and DeadLetterQueue is not Custom.
-or-

exception.span: DeadLetterQueue 在 Windows 2003/XP 上設定為 Custom。

span.span: DeadLetterQueue is set to Custom on Windows 2003/XP.
-or-

exception.span: ExactlyOnce 為 false，而 DeadLetterQueue 為 Custom。

span.span: ExactlyOnce is false and DeadLetterQueue is Custom.
-or-

exception.span: CustomDeadLetterQueue 已設定，而且沒有可寫入佇列的寫入權限或是佇列不存在。

span.span: CustomDeadLetterQueue is set and if there is no write permission to write to queue or if queue does not exist.
-or-

span.span: If CustomDeadLetterQueue is non-transactional.
-or-

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1<!!TChannel> BuildChannelListener<class (class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel) TChannel>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function BuildChannelListener(Of TChannel As {Class, IChannel}) (context As BindingContext) As IChannelListener(Of TChannel)

override this.BuildChannelListener : System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext -> System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener<'Channel (requires 'Channel : null and 'Channel :> System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel)> (requires 'Channel : null and 'Channel :> System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel)

summary.span: 使用提供的內容建置通道接聽程式。

span.span: Builds a channel listener using the context provided.

returns.span: MSMQ 整合通道接聽程式，它可用來建立通道，以便從現有的 MSMQ 應用程式接收訊息。

span.span: An MSMQ integration channel listener that can be used to create channels to receive messages from existing MSMQ applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道接聽程式是在服務上建立的，而且可以用來接收用戶端通道所傳送的訊息。Channel listeners are created on the service and are used to receive messages sent by a client channel. 服務必須依序呼叫 `IChannelListener.Open` 和 `IChannelListener.AcceptChannel`，才會取得實際通道的參考。The service must call `IChannelListener.Open` and then `IChannelListener.AcceptChannel` to get a reference to the actual channel. 接著，則必須呼叫 `IChannel.Open` 來開啟通道。Then `IChannel.Open` must be called to open the channel. 此時，此通道才可以用來擷取訊息。At this point, the channel can be used to retrieve messages.

The is not .

-or-

-or-

span.span: ReceiveErrorHandling is set to Move and queue name contains a ";" in Windows Vista.
-or-

exception.span: ExactlyOnce 設定為 ，而且在 Windows Vista 中無法開啟重試子佇列。

span.span: ExactlyOnce is set to and cannot open retry sub-queue in Windows Vista.
-or-

exception.span: ReceiveErrorHandling 設定為 Reject 或 Move，而且平台為 Windows Vista。

span.span: ReceiveErrorHandling is set to Reject or Move and the platform is Windows Vista.
-or-

exception.span: 設定為 WindowsDomain，而且如果未使用 Active Directory 整合安裝 MSMQ。

-or-

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回字串 "msmq.formatname"，指出 MSMQ 整合通道所使用的定址配置。This property returns the string "msmq.formatname" to indicate the addressing scheme used by the MSMQ integration channel. 如需有關佇列定址的詳細資訊，請參閱[服務端點與佇列定址](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md)。For more information about queue addressing, see [Service Endpoints and Queue Addressing](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/service-endpoints-and-queue-addressing.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MsmqToWcf#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_msmqtowcf/cs/service.cs#2)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定要在序列化 MSMQ 訊息時使用的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.

value.span: 要在序列化 MSMQ 訊息時使用的 。

span.span: The to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以具有下列其中一個值：This property can have one of the following values: - `ActiveX`：ActiveX 序列化程式是用來序列化物件。`ActiveX` - The ActiveX serializer is used to serialize objects. - `Binary`： 是用來序列化物件。`Binary` - The is used to serialize objects. - `ByteArray`：此物件會序列化為位元組陣列。`ByteArray` - The object is serialized to an array of bytes. - `Stream`：物件會序列化為資料流。`Stream` - The object is serialized to a stream. - `Xml`： 是用來序列化物件。`Xml` - The is used to serialize objects. - 預設值為 `Xml`。The default value is `Xml`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MsmqToWcf#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_msmqtowcf/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

exception.span: 這個值不在 的值範圍內。

span.span: The value is not within the values of .

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的陣列，其中包含訊息還原序列化後應該產生的類型。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of objects that contain the types to which messages should be deserialized.

value.span: 的陣列，其中包含訊息還原序列化後應該產生的類型。

span.span: An array of that contains the types to which messages should be deserialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MSMQ 訊息的本文是不具類型的。The body of an MSMQ message is not typed. 屬性可讓您指定傳送從 MSMQ 應用程式以接收 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的應用程式時，訊息會還原序列化的型別。The property enables you to specify the types to which messages are deserialized when they are sent from an MSMQ application to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) receiving application. 這個屬性只能在 設定為 `Xml` 時使用。This property is used only if is set to `Xml`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MsmqToWcf#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_msmqtowcf/cs/snippets.cs#4)]
